text: "I Love Me Better Than That" is the title of an R&B;/gospel single by Shirley Murdock. It was the first single released from her second gospel album Soulfood. The single spent seven weeks on the Billboard Gospel Songs chart and peaked at No. 22. ==Chart positions== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2007) !Peak position |- |US Billboard Gospel Songs |align="center"|22 |} ==References== Category:2007 singles Category:2007 songs Category:Gospel songs
title: I Love Me Better Than That
